name: Oh My Wrench
summary:
How long can you survive the road?

In Oh My Wrench, you’ll take the wheel in an endless car-driving adventure where the main goal is to survive as long as possible while dodging unpredictable obstacles. As you progress, the speed increases, pushing your reflexes to the limit. Compete for the highest score on a global leaderboard that now features both all-time and weekly rankings, giving you fresh opportunities to shine every week!

To spice up the challenge, pick up bonuses along the way: grab an extra life to keep going, a time-slowing hourglass to catch your breath, or special coins to boost your score. Combined with a fast-paced day-night cycle and dynamic weather shifts, every moment feels fresh, thrilling, and filled with new surprises.

Can you navigate the chaos, collect the bonuses, and claim the top spot? Find out in Oh My Wrench!
